name: Pre-Merge Preview Validation
hypothesis: Adding type checking and linting to pre-merge will reduce CI failures and rework

name: CI Concurrency Tuning
hypothesis: Parallelizing CI jobs will reduce feedback time without increasing failures

name: Canary Deployment for Heaviest API
hypothesis: Canary deployments will reduce risk and enable faster rollbacks

name: Review Queue Optimization
hypothesis: Adding review assignments and SLAs will reduce review lead time

name: Performance Monitoring on PRs
hypothesis: Auto-commenting performance diffs on PRs will prevent regressions
